sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Create a scheduled job to run time taking PPS fix scripts for Istanbul</description> <name>PPS Istanbul Upgrade</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var job = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script'); job.get('name', 'PPS_Istanbul_Upgrade'); SncTriggerSynchronizer.executeNow(job);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-07-04 04:41:23</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6e6599db9310220064f572edb67ffbbd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>PPS Istanbul Upgrade</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Project Portfolio Suite" source="com.snc.project_portfolio_suite">1aef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6e6599db9310220064f572edb67ffbbd</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-07-04 04:41:23</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
